titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the disparity between identical prescription drugs sold in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the cost disparity between identical prescription drugs sold in the United States, Canada, and Mexico should be reduced or eliminated.
